_meanings:
{@--1@} In the presence
of, before the very eyes, visibly,
openly, evidently.

{@--3@} Directly. In <ab>comp.</ab> it is often
translated by ‘incarnate’;  
{#sAkzAdyamaH#}; or by ‘open, direct’;  
{#tatsAkzAtpratizeDaH kopAya#} <ls>Māl. 1. 11.</ls> ( 
{#sAkzAtkf#} {1} to see with one's own eyes,
realize personally. {2} to have an
intuitive perception or manifestation
of; {#sAkzAtkftaDarmARa FzayaH#} <ls>U. 7</ls>).
